translations.translation: So they set off, quietly saying to one another,
So they departed, talking in low voices:
So off they went, whispering to one another:
They all left, whispering to one another,
So they went off, while whispering to one another.
So they departed, and they were whispering:
So they went, while they consulted together secretly,
So they departed, whispering together,
So they went off, saying one unto another in low tones:
So they went off, whispering to one another,
So they went off speaking to each other in a low voice:
So off they went, murmuring to one another:
So they departed, conversing in secret low tones, (saying)-
So they departed, conversing in secret low tones (saying),
And so they departed, whispering to one another:
So off they went, murmuring to one another.
So they set out, while lowering their voices,
[68:23] So off they went, whispering to one another, talking secretly:

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: فَانْطَلَقُوا وَهُمْ يَتَخَافَتُونَ (23) والتخافت : تفاعل من خَفَتَ إذا أسرّ الكَلام .

translations.translation: (So they went off) towards the fields, (saying one unto another in low tones:

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَٱنطَلَقُواْ وَهُمْ يَتَخَافَتُونَ } معناه يَتشاورونَ

translations.translation: And His saying, "Then set out and they will be in fear," [means that they will] consult.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَٱنطَلَقُواْ } بأجمعهم نحوها { وَهُمْ } حينئذٍ { يَتَخَافَتُونَ } [القلم: 23] ويكتمون ذهابهم عن الناس
 ويسرون كلامهم فيما بينهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { فانطلقوا وهم يتخافتون } يتساررون فيما بينهم بطريق المخافتة
